content: Thank you for the comment! It really is… On point. Wouldn’t have thought to receive such a comment, kudos to you! You’re right, it kinda is a people manipulation project :DBut it’s open source, that, for me, makes a big difference compared to all the paid services. And maybe just for completeness, after I build the first version and realised I could drive it a bit further, the idea was to get “free” products from marketers :D
